title: A Good Life Is More About Liberation Than Transformation.
itunes:title: A Good Life Is More About Liberation Than Transformation.
description:
What if you didn't have to change?

What if everything you wanted, everything you needed, everything you aspired to become, you already had and were.

What if living a good life was more about liberating and revealing than changing and becoming?

The words transformation and evolution have become buzz-words across the landscape of personal development.

The implication is that you, on the deepest level, are not who you need to be. That you need to become or step into something different and better before you can live your best life.

But, what if that was a lie?

What if deep down, you already were your best self and the work was really just about revealing it, removing the illusion, then living it?

That's what today's short and sweet Good Life Project Riff is all about.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
